items.question: What types of videos can I add captions to?
items.answer: You can add captions to any video format, including MP4, MOV, and AVI files. Our platform supports a wide range of formats, ensuring compatibility for all your video content.

items.question: How accurate are the automatically generated captions?
items.answer: Our AI models achieve high accuracy with captions based on context and language. You can easily review and edit captions to ensure they meet your standards before finalizing.

items.question: Can I customize the style of the captions?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can choose from various font styles, sizes, colors, and placements to match your video's aesthetic and improve viewer experience.

items.question: Do you support multiple languages for captions?
items.answer: Yes, our solution supports automatic generation of captions in multiple languages, making it easy to reach a global audience.

items.question: How long does it take to generate captions?
items.answer: Caption generation is typically fast, taking just a few minutes, depending on your video's length. The process is designed for efficiency without sacrificing quality.

items.question: Are there any additional fees for commercial use?
items.answer: No! All captions generated come with commercial rights at no additional cost, allowing you to use them freely across various platforms.

items.question: Can I edit captions after they are generated?
items.answer: Yes, our platform allows you to edit and refine captions as needed. You can adjust timings and text to ensure perfect synchronization and clarity.

items.question: What if I encounter issues with the captioning process?
items.answer: Our support team is here to help! We provide resources, tutorials, and direct assistance to resolve any issues quickly.

items.question: Can I use captions for live streaming?
items.answer: Yes! Our AI includes real-time captioning features for live video broadcasts, improving accessibility for all viewers.
